Summary: I was on my way home from town, when I saw a brite lite in the sky I watched it 4 awhile when friend had noticed it she pulled over 2 take some pictures then we continued home.
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a brite lite in the sky @ around 9Pm july,7 2010 while my friend & I were on our way back from town.I continued @ watch it as we were stopping by my father inlaws house upon pulling out of the drive way I noticed it was still there. my girl friend didnt notice it untill we got on loblolly rd were she had decided 2 pull over & start taking pictures on her cell phone camera. we continued 2 watch it all the way home when we arrived I got my camera out & started taking pictures atfer I took like 33 pics I went inside 2 see what I got I have a pic of a craft that looks like it was flying right @ me I also have side view of that same craft. I continued 2 go outside periodicaly an taking more pics each time this went on till I went 2 bed.All the pics I took that nite the object was always a differant shape & brite ness. I now have about 200 pics on my camera & about 50 or more of them have something in them.I am continueing 2 take pictures 4 as long as I can i was just out a few minutes ago & got more pics my sithing is still on going & its not an every nite occurence but it has been pretty regular since that first nite.I have been trying 2 contact your organization by phone because I am computer illiterite,& I would like 4 someone 2 return my calls so I can get my story out there. I cant send u pics because I dont know how im suprisied I got this far.I know that wat I saw was real cause I didnt have any idea of what it could be untill I saw my pictures & they speek 4 themselves & they are quite amazing & I think u all will be very astonished when u can see them 4 yourselves. Sincerly,Wendy Kastner
trends: There have been no other sightings in LaBelle
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Shape: Boomerang, Fireball, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle, Other
